title: Cypilot Kit Constraints (constraints.json)
description: Kit-level constraints for artifact IDs. Root keys are artifact kinds (e.g. PRD, DESIGN, FEATURE).

headings.description: Outline contract for markdown headings within this artifact kind.

identifiers.description: Map of id kind to its constraint entry.

headings.description: Allowed heading constraint ids where this ID kind may be defined.

task.description: Whether task checkbox is required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).

priority.description: Whether priority marker is required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).

references.description: Map of artifact kinds to reference rules.

coverage.description: Whether reference is required (true), prohibited (false), or optional (null/omitted).

task.description: Whether task checkbox is required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).

priority.description: Whether priority marker is required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).

headings.description: Heading constraint ids that define required locations for references (when coverage=required). Otherwise, references are allowed anywhere unless coverage=prohibited.

multiple.description: Whether multiple occurrences are required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).

numbered.description: Whether numbered headings are required (true), prohibited (false), or allowed (null/omitted).
